detailsData.title: Experienced Counsel
detailsData.content: With nearly 25 years of experience, Sorensen Law Group, P.C. has helped businesses avoid and overcome a wide variety of employment law challenges. Our depth of understanding and knowledge regarding employment law and trade secret matters has made us a first choice for many in the business community.

detailsData.title: Personalized Services
detailsData.content: Inspired by his entrepreneurial friends, colleagues, and clients, Rod Sorensen founded Sorensen Law Group, P.C. to provide more personalized and tailored services. We understand the business community and have worked to support business leaders through whatever challenges they faced.

detailsData.title: Successful Litigation
detailsData.content: Mr. Sorensen has successfully defended employers against numerous employee claims of sexual harassment, discrimination, retaliation, defamation, and wrongful termination. He has obtained multiple verdicts on behalf of employers in arbitrations and hearings before the California Labor Commissioner.

detailsData.title: Proprietary Information Protection
detailsData.content: Mr. Sorensen has obtained injunctive relief against employees for misappropriation of proprietary information. He has also secured summary judgment/adjudication in favor of employers in a multitude of cases, including class action wage and hour litigation, wrongful termination, and disability discrimination.
